extendedIngredients.name: granny smith apples
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 granny smith apples, peeled and sliced

extendedIngredients.name: pastry dough
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 15.8 oz. tub of Pre-made Pie & Pastry Dough

extendedIngredients.name: pecans
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup of pecans, finely chopped

extendedIngredients.name: white whole wheat flour
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ cup of white whole wheat flour

recipes.title: Mini Apple Pie Tartlets with Pecan Streusel

winePairing.pairingText: Fingerfood can be paired with Sparkling rosé and Sparkling Wine. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. The Bellissima Sparkling rosé with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosé, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling Rosé pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor d’oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 425.Spray 5 mini tart tins with Pam.Roll out pie dough on a counter, cut out circles and place each circle over the sprayed tartlet tin and press dough down on the bottom and sides.In a large bowl, add granny smith slices, cinnamon, nutmeg, pinch of salt, brown sugar, and water. Toss to coat.Evenly spread cinnamon apple mixture amongst the 5 tartlet tins.In a small bowl, combine chopped pecans, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, and butter. Stir till all combined.Sprinkle pecan streusel over each tartlet tin.Place tartlets on a baking sheet {this will help catch any spill over}Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until dough is slightly browned.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 425.Spray 5 mini tart tins with Pam.

Roll out pie dough on a counter, cut out circles and place each circle over the sprayed tartlet tin and press dough down on the bottom and sides.In a large bowl, add granny smith slices, cinnamon, nutmeg, pinch of salt, brown sugar, and water. Toss to coat.Evenly spread cinnamon apple mixture amongst the 5 tartlet tins.In a small bowl, combine chopped pecans, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, and butter. Stir till all combined.Sprinkle pecan streusel over each tartlet tin.
Place tartlets on a baking sheet {this will help catch any spill over}
Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until dough is slightly browned.
